channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- PostX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- PostX

item.title: CVE-2023-3992|2023-08-30T14:22:02.880Z -- unknown -- postx
item.description: The PostX WordPress plugin before 3.0.6 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin
